channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 22:29 Threat of Artbuster! Now in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 22:29 Threat of Artbuster! Now in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
